name: Backrooms: The Chase
description:
What happens when you get "noclipped" into a backrooms level, where a wave of deadly monsters  is closing in on you?...

RUN!

And team up with other prey along the way!

Each of them has unique abilities!

  • Muscleman: He breaks walls
  • Little Girl: She attacks Monsters
  • Old Lady: She flies
  • Youtuber: She can literally delay the monster stream a bit... but only when she takes damage
Instructions

WASD to move

Space to Dash

Click the icons on the right to switch teammates!

Have fun everyone! Don't forget to SURVIVE!
